website_summaries.verdict: An affordable option for race-inspired carbon fiber to keep the grams off of the road bike.
pros: Carbon fiber construction lightens the overall weight of the handlebar and front of the bike for extra speed and power
Comes in several different sizes for a personal fit
cons: Internal cable routing can damage brake and shifting cables

customer_reviews.title: Don't be fooled by the low price. This is excellent quality and design.
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and finish. Love it! Installed and rode it and it's solid. 9/5/18 Update: 3500 miles under my belt on these bars and I love them even more. No problems whatsoever and I've lightly crashed with them twice (hit the brake lever on the pavement, both right and left at low speed)..
customer_reviews.author: P. Graff

customer_reviews.title: By far the worst aero bars and internal cabling design ever
customer_reviews.text: By far the worst aero bars and internal cabling design ever. It's cheaply designed even though it's made out if carbon, the bar ends are not standard sized and the internal cabling system is broken. It looks good but it's a piece of crap chinese bontrager knock off. If you go to their website it claims in the top it's made in the united States but the about us section is misleading, literally unfinished and from Guangdong China. Buyers beware, run the other way!
customer_reviews.author: Han

customer_reviews.title: great, with a flaw.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described. If the manufacture would make the entrance and exit holes for the cables bigger, they would be great. I drilled out the holes(very slowly) and it worked fine, but I shouldn't have to do that. Regardless, I would reccomend them if the buyer understands the one drawback.
customer_reviews.author: Debera H. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Poor internal routing.
customer_reviews.text: Usually do not review, but felt obligated on this one. The internal routing channels were are a mess, filled with carbon layup and the exit was challenged to fit cables through. There is no "straw" to feed so have fun spending entirely too much time on passing cables and doing surgery on the bars. This is coming from someone who builds on average 20 bikes a year. They are priced right (not a deal, but cheap) and appear to have good finish and strong composition. If you don't mind the hassle for the cost savings and/or are running di2 than these could be more favorable.
customer_reviews.author: Sean McBride

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: Great item, materials, and craftsmanship for the price. Sleek, easy to install, and built-in cable routing is a plus. Only bad thing was longer than average shipping time and inability to track. I was given a delivery window, so I never knew when it would actually arrive, but when it did, it was like Christmas!
customer_reviews.author: Gilbert Trejo Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Great handlebars!
customer_reviews.text: Put about 100 miles on the bike with these. Really like the wide top of the bars, very comfortable hand placement. I actually chose to only run the grip tape to the top bend (not on the straight/flat part) and it's very comfortable. Would recommend to anyone looking for an inexpensive aero bar!
customer_reviews.author: Mark K.

customer_reviews.title: these are good value
customer_reviews.text: Have purchased carbon bars at two to five times the price ~ these are good value. Even new off the shelf products have customizing to be dealt with: smoothing inner lip of internal brake cable routing; I use Di2 shifting and routing shift cable thru internal holes in bars was not so difficult. Four stars given as there is room for improvement and really only about 2% of anything is deserving of 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: 66 VW

customer_reviews.title: Impressed so far!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted this shape handlebars, and they are also very light. I was worried they would flex too much. However, they feel strong and stiff. Only put a few hundred miles on em so far, Ill report back after more miles!!! Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Angela P.

customer_reviews.title: Item cracked
customer_reviews.text: I have had these handle bars for 1 month and they cracked on a ride today.
customer_reviews.author: R

customer_reviews.title: Cracked
customer_reviews.text: These bars cracked. They didnt even last more than a week.
customer_reviews.author: Adan Guerrero

customer_reviews.title: Danger, Danger, Danger. Unsafe.
customer_reviews.text: Bars cracked at mounting bracket within one week. Used a torque tool for installation. Former bike shop owner, so I kinda know what I'm doing. Dangerous at best.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Rodgers

customer_reviews.title: MUST BUY
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been eyeing this item for a while and finally decided to pick this up, I’m very happy With my purchase, it’s exactly like the high end brands but for a better deal!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Johnny

customer_reviews.title: Carbon Handlebar
customer_reviews.text: Wow, It's been a while since I've bought carbon components for my bikes, and these are so light. Nice design and style.
customer_reviews.author: Harry C.

customer_reviews.title: Nice carbon bars at an affordable price!
customer_reviews.text: These handlebars are excellent quality and price so much lower than other carbon handlebars you'd buy at you local bike shop! I'm very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Tx MTB'er

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product, at a good price!
customer_reviews.text: Thank you for manufacturing amazing product, I would like to recommend to anybody who looking for an inexpensive strong handlebar. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Odessit

customer_reviews.title: Well built
customer_reviews.text: I was able to feed the brake and shifter cables through the handlebars with no problems. well designed.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Perez

customer_reviews.title: The angle was so bad (more than 90) it mangled the cable housing
customer_reviews.text: After swapping in the new bars I took the bike to the shop (very professional shop) to have the cable work done. Turns out the internal break cable channels were not drilled out properly and they couldn’t get it to work due to this. Ended up just wrapping the break cables under the handlebar tape. I’m not talking about a small margin. The angle was so bad (more than 90) it mangled the cable housing. Other than that, it’s ok, good price, will know better after some miles.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Complete junk do not buy.
customer_reviews.text: Broke after about 2 weeks. Carbon cracked we're the cable pass through is. Complete junk do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: Dale A Watts Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and great value
customer_reviews.text: This handlebar is as good as any costing 10X more. It feels and looks solid. The reason I don't give it five stars is because the bar end holes required me to ream them. Excess paint on the inside perimeter prevented my Fizik end plugs from going in.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great seller the best
customer_reviews.text: Awesome item supper comfortable lightweight and strong excellent service great seller I appreciate your help
customer_reviews.author: Rene M.

customer_reviews.title: Carbon Bars
customer_reviews.text: This could have been ugly!! I lean my bike again my car it fell I didn't realize it till I was riding that the bar was broke!!
customer_reviews.author: Darryl G.

customer_reviews.title: Cracked during first ride
customer_reviews.text: The handlebar snapped on my first ride and now I am out of return window. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Misleading
customer_reviews.text: Misleading, cannot, I repeat cannot attach aero bars to these cf handlebars, pretty disappointing...
customer_reviews.author: Emanuel Chavez

customer_reviews.title: Weighs more than advertised
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 examples and both weighed 250g+ compared to the 225g advertised. Otherwise seems like a nice bar.
customer_reviews.author: Derek

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great handlebars. Well made with a little flex for comfort. Very comfortable even on rides +4 hrs. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: N

customer_reviews.title: Keep right torque....on stem..
customer_reviews.text: Weight 206gs...157gs lighter than orginal bars....have only 12miles ...installed yesterday....seems good so far...
customer_reviews.author: Clark

customer_reviews.title: comfortable, super high quality - very happy with this
customer_reviews.text: Stiff, light, comfortable, super high quality - very happy with this!
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: the cuality of the parts
customer_reviews.text: asume besparts fast shipping good cuality ar lest cost thanks
customer_reviews.author: Julio

customer_reviews.title: Been very happy with the quality and design
customer_reviews.text: Used it now for over 500 miles and no issues whatsoever. Been very happy with the quality and design.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Allison

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Does not feel cheap and it's easy to install great packing too. Came in about 2 days after ordering
customer_reviews.author: roberto perez

customer_reviews.title: Bar was ruined by installing shifter
customer_reviews.text: I had issues getting the clamp to slide over the bend. Only had the issue on one side. Even after spreading the clamp out, loosening it up completely, and adding a little dish soap to lube it, the bar was damaged by installing the shifter. Took a ton of force to get the shifter in place and after all the scratches and some cracking sounds, I wouldn’t trust these bars after that. There was no other alternative to getting the shifter past the bend though. Bummed cause they seemed like good bars for the price and were light. If only the left shifter could have slipped on as easily as the left.
customer_reviews.author: Soup

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: What l like most is the level of riding comfort it offers. It is tough, offers internal routing and has the clamping areas already roughed up, no need for carbon assembly gel. Very pleased with the purchase. Really transformed the ride of my bike quite a lot in the positive direction. Arrived quickly, well packed and with tracking info via UPS.
customer_reviews.author: axel

customer_reviews.title: Great handlebar
customer_reviews.text: Feather-light, strong and good lookin. THe onlything is not very clear to me is the bottom hole for the internal cable routing.
customer_reviews.author: igrex

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I love the comfort and the functionality of this set of bars. It's a great value for the weight and it's also amazingly comfortable for those longer distance rides.
customer_reviews.author: Titusxxx11

product_meta.title: RXL SL Full Carbon Fiber Road Bike Handlebar Racing Handle Bike Bend to Inside Light 400/420/440mm
feature_bullets: 3.Carbon Fiber compares to Aluminum Alloy:Lighter in weight.Much more beautiful in appearance. Brighter in Color. Stronger in pressure resistance. Anti-Shock. Has proper elasticity, improving your bicycle’s class in minutes.

4.This style is one of the standard mold of modern road racing bike,its tortuosity is especially made to fits the brake system, and in the position of the brake system, we prayed it with a layer of granule paint to increase the friction between the brake handle and the handlebar, providing you a safer and comfortable riding.
